content: If someone could take a look at #14034, it would be helpful, since I'm trying to make another push toward getting more basic graph theory in. @Bhavik Mehta had approved an earlier version of it, but I added the more general simple_graph.map and simple_graph.comap for pushing forward and pulling back graph structures along functions.
I would be more comfortable with a smaller PR that defines map and comap for simple_graph and subgraph, but otherwise I'm quite happy with it.
Yeah, I admittedly am breaking PR best practices with this one
It seems the combinatorialist maintainers are away, so this is just a ping in case anyone happens to have some time to take a look.
Sorry got absorbed by Con(NF)! Will have a look tonight.
